data.title: Tom Jones Tickets - VIP & Hospitality Tickets
data.meta_description: Book official Tom Jones VIP tickets & hospitality packages for upcoming Tom Jones concerts in 2024. Have an unforgettable experience by securing yours now.
data.text:
Step into the world of music legend Tom Jones with the magic of his incredible live performances. The iconic 'Sex Bomb' crooner and beloved Welsh sensation has enthralled audiences with his raspy melodies, infectious tracks, and charismatic persona for over seven decades.

While the remarkable shows at Greenwich Summer Sounds, Uptonsteel County Ground, and Newbury Racecourse have concluded, you can ensure your chances of being part of the Tom Jones live experience with Seat Unique.

Don't miss the opportunity to secure your spot at future Tom Jones concert dates, including his headline performance at Hampton Court Palace Festival in 2024 with official VIP tickets and hospitality packages. With a premium concert experience, you can truly immerse yourself in an unforgettable night of music and memories.

Tom Jones VIP ticket packages are designed to make your evening truly exceptional. You can expect to revel in prime location seating that places you right in the heart of the action. Delight in complimentary drinks and delicious cuisine, ensuring your night is catered for in every way. This could be your chance to watch Tom Jones perform from the best seats in the house, all while enjoying premium amenities.

Register your interest in VIP tickets and hospitality packages for Tom Jones' through Seat Unique.

Tom Jones 2024 UK Tour Dates

Last year, Tom Jones graced massive stages during the 'Ages & Stages Tour', headlining electrifying events like Belsonic Belfast, Hampton Court Palace Festival, Heritage Live, and The Jockey Club. A highlight was his headline act at the esteemed Greenwich Summer Sounds Festival in July.

In 2024, Sir Tom will play at the following venues:

Hampton Court Palace Festival, London, Tuesday 11th June

Plymouth Hoe, Plymouth, Thursday 13th June

Southampton Summer Sessions, Southampton, Saturday 15th June

Scarborough Open Air Theatre, Scarborough, Wednesday 26th June

High Lodge, Thetford Forest, Friday 28th June

City Park, Stirling, Sunday 30th June

Llangollen International Musical Eisteddfod, Llangollen, Tuesday 2nd July

Bedford Park, Bedford, Thursday 4th July

Chepstow Summer Sessions, Chepstow Racecourse, Friday 5th July

Chepstow Summer Sessions, Chepstow Racecourse, Saturday 6th July

Derby Summer Sessions, Derby, Friday 12th July

The Piece Hall, Halifax, Friday 12th July

Derby Summer Sessions, Derby, Saturday 13th July

Salt & Tar, Bootle Canalside, Liverpool, Sunday 18th August

As a trusted premium ticketing marketplace for live events, Seat Unique ensures you won't miss a beat when it comes to experiencing Tom Jones live in concert. Register your interest with us to hear about his upcoming tour.

Legendary Welsh soul-pop sensation, Tom Jones, is renowned for chart-topping hits like 'Delilah' and 'It's Not Unusual', and has left an indelible mark on the music scene. His collaborations with top artists such as Stereophonics and Mousse T. have added to his allure.

With an astounding repertoire of 41 studio albums, the iconic Sir Tom Jones, now at 80, has unveiled his latest record, 'Surrounded By Time'. His age-defying energy and unmatched live performances continue to captivate audiences.

About Tom Jones

Tom Jones, whose real name is Sir Thomas Jones Woodward OBE, is a Welsh singer. Born on June 7, 1940, he began his career in the 1960s with a series of top 10 hits. Known for his full-throated, robust baritone voice, Jones has gained global recognition and has been a regular performer, including in Las Vegas, from 1967 to 2011. Some of his popular songs include "It's Not Unusual," "Delilah," and "Green, Green Grass of Home".

Throughout his career, Tom Jones has received numerous awards and achievements. He became a judge on the singing competition show, The Voice, further showcasing his musical expertise. His musical style covers genres such as rhythm and blues, soul, rock, and pop. He has a rich and diverse repertoire.

Tom Jones has had a career spanning over six decades and has sold millions of records worldwide. He is known not only for his powerful voice but also for his charismatic stage presence and energetic performances. He can captivate audiences with his unique blend of pop, rock, soul, and R&B sounds.

Early Success

Jones' breakthrough came in the mid-1960s with songs like "It's Not Unusual," which reached the top of the charts in the UK and US. He continued to release hit after hit, including "What's New Pussycat?" "She's a Lady," and "Kiss." His dynamic vocals and magnetic stage persona earned him a dedicated fan base and a reputation as one of the greatest performers of his generation.

Collaborations

In addition to his success as a solo artist, Tom Jones has collaborated with various other musicians over the years. He recorded songs with artists like The Cardigans, Van Morrison, and Stereophonics, showcasing his versatility and ability to adapt to different musical styles.

Awards

Over the years, Jones has received numerous accolades for his contributions to music. He has been nominated for and won several prestigious awards, including a BRIT Award, a Grammy Award, and two MTV Video Music Awards.

Welsh Roots

Despite his international fame, Tom Jones has remained dedicated to his Welsh roots. He has often incorporated elements of Welsh music and culture into his performances, and he is highly regarded in his home country as a cultural icon.

Tom Jones continues to perform and record new music well into his 80s, demonstrating his enduring passion for his craft and his commitment to entertaining audiences around the world.

Tom Jones' Most Popular Songs

"It's Not Unusual"

"Delilah"

"She's a Lady"

"Green, Green Grass of Home

"What's New Pussycat?"

"Kiss"

"Thunderball"

"Sex Bomb"

"Help Yourself"

"Love Me Tonight"

Tom Jones' Most Popular Albums

Green, Green Grass of Home - This album, released in 1967, is often considered one of Jones' best and features the popular title track.

Reload - Released in 1999, this album is a compilation of Jones' collaborations with various artists, including the hit song "Sex Bomb" with Mousse T.

Delilah - Named after his famous hit single, this album was released in 1968 and features a mix of pop and soul songs.

Praise & Blame - Released in 2010, this album marked a departure from Jones' usual pop sound, featuring a more stripped-down, gospel-inspired approach.

Long Lost Suitcase - Released in 2015, this album is part of a trilogy that explores Jones' musical roots, featuring a mix of blues, country, and soul influences.
